001package gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IFallibleBiConsumer;
004
005import java.util.Collection;
006
007/**
008 * <p>IFallibleFilterChain interface.</p>
009 *
010 * @author GustavBW
011 * @version $Id: $Id
012 */
013public interface IFallibleFilterChain<T,R> extends IFilterChain<IFallibleBiConsumer<T>,R> {
014    /**
015     * <p>run.</p>
016     *
017     * @param old a T object
018     * @param newer a T object
019     * @throws java.lang.Exception if any.
020     */
021    void run(T old, T newer) throws Exception;
022
023    /**
024     * <p>runAllowExceptions.</p>
025     *
026     * @return Any exceptions that occurred during setting the value or running the filter chain if invoked.
027     * @param old a T object
028     * @param newer a T object
029     */
030    Collection<Exception> runAllowExceptions(T old, T newer);
031}
